attributes.action: Stricter laws/policies should be enforced against Racial Discrimination.
attributes.additional_details: Having experienced racial discrimination multiple times - I had believed people were protesting or demonstrating for laws to be enforced even if they were - still nothing had happened. In our so called "equal society" racism is rising by the day and if reforms isn`t made soon our society will collapse for the second time since June - July 2020. This time it won`t be the same.
attributes.background: I want stricter laws or policies to be put in place to reduce the amount of racial hate crimes speculating in England.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to strengthen these laws.  
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you think that a crime has been committed, you should contact the police here:

https://www.police.uk/contact/
